launcher.startScript: (cd ~/jenkins-utils && git pull git@github.com:sifive/jenkins-utils.git) && \ AGENT_NAME=SLURM.CRITICAL.007 \ JNLP_SECRET=0a1e6af1be78b5e207bb156fe5c70799f74ae31fcac34dd4f8146826c1c51b08 \ JENKINS_AGENT_SLURM_PARTITION=redhat \ JENKINS_AGENT_SALLOC_ACCOUNT=misc_ci \ JENKINS_URL=https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/ \ ~/jenkins-utils/tools/jenkins-agent-salloc-small.sh
